thread.title: Ryan Sweeting asks for spousal support from estranged wife Kaley Cuoco
thread.title_full: Ryan Sweeting asks for spousal support from estranged wife Kaley Cuoco | Latest News & Updates at Daily News & Analysis

author: PTI
title: Ryan Sweeting asks for spousal support from estranged wife Kaley Cuoco
text:
The couple in happier times Getty Images The Big Bang Theory actress Kaley Cuoco's estranged husband Ryan Sweeting has reportedly asked for spousal support in response to her divorce request in September.
The 28-year-old tennis player, who is worth an estimated US $2 million, wants the actress, 29, to fork out monthly maintenance in response to her divorce request, according to the court documents obtained by Entertainment Tonight.
Cuoco, believed to be worth approximately US $45 million, filed for divorce from the sportsman in September citing "irreconcilable differences" as the reason for their split. The couple signed a pre-nuptial agreement one month before their marriage on December 31, 2013 and she has listed their date of separation as September 3, 2015.
Her divorce filing states that property and spousal support information is detailed in the pre-nuptial agreement.
